summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Leaderlix Automation Platform. All critical features are working correctly: Contacts (965), Companies (5000), Sectors (10 active), and Buyer Personas (79) pages load without freezing. Events page shows alert with fictitious names ordered by contact count. Theme selection dialog has both 'Generar con IA' and 'Escribir manualmente' options. AI title generation using Emergent LLM works correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Console warning: button cannot be descendant of button (nested buttons in accordion)

passed_tests: Backend API: /api/ root endpoint returns 200
Backend API: /api/auth/login returns 200 with valid credentials
Backend API: /api/auth/login returns 401 with invalid credentials
Backend API: /api/hubspot/contacts returns 200 with contacts list
Backend API: /api/hubspot/companies returns 200 with companies list
Backend API: /api/hubspot/sectors returns 200 with sectors list
Backend API: /api/hubspot/buyer-personas returns 200 with buyer_personas dict
Backend API: /api/buyer-personas-db/ returns 200 with personas list including display_name
Backend API: /api/thematic-axes/ returns 200 with thematic axes list
Backend API: /api/events/ returns 200 with events list
Backend API: /api/events/generate-title returns 200 with AI-generated title
Frontend: Login page loads correctly
Frontend: Login with valid credentials redirects to dashboard
Frontend: Dashboard shows 965 contacts count
Frontend: Contacts page (/contacts) loads correctly with 965 contacts in 29 groups
Frontend: Contacts page shows fictitious names (Mariana Otros, Roberto Otros, Mateo, etc.)
Frontend: Companies page (/companies) loads correctly with 5000 companies
Frontend: Sectors page (/sectors) loads correctly with 10 active sectors
Frontend: Buyer Personas page (/buyer-personas) loads correctly with 79 personas
Frontend: Events page (/events) loads correctly with alert showing buyer personas without future events
Frontend: Events alert shows fictitious names ordered by contact count (Mariana Otros 298, Roberto Otros 181, Mateo 133, etc.)
Frontend: Clicking 'Crear' in alert opens theme selection dialog
Frontend: Theme selection dialog shows 'Generar con IA' option (active by default)
Frontend: Theme selection dialog shows 'Escribir manualmente' option
Frontend: Theme selection dialog shows thematic axes (Storytelling, Liderazgo, Inteligencia Artificial, Marca Personal)
Frontend: Manual title mode shows input field for custom title
Frontend: AI title generation works - generates title based on theme and buyer persona
Frontend: Generated title example: 'Inteligencia Artificial para Direcciones de RRHH'
Frontend: Event form buyer personas selector shows fictitious names with contact counts
Frontend: Event form buyer personas selector has search filter
Frontend: Event form buyer personas selector has area filter dropdown
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Nested button warning in Contacts page accordion - consider restructuring the accordion trigger to avoid button nesting
context_for_next_testing_agent: All critical bug fixes verified: 1) Contacts/Companies/Sectors/Buyer Personas pages load correctly without freezing, 2) Events page alert shows buyer personas with fictitious names ordered by contact count, 3) Theme selection dialog has two modes: 'Generar con IA' (shows thematic axes) and 'Escribir manualmente' (shows title input), 4) AI title generation using Emergent LLM works correctly, 5) Buyer personas selector in event form has search and area filters with fictitious names and descriptions.

contacts_page.details: 965 contacts load correctly with fictitious names (Mariana Otros, Roberto Otros, Mateo, etc.) grouped by buyer persona

companies_page.details: 5000 companies load correctly with 103 industries identified

sectors_page.details: 10 active sectors load correctly (Pharmaceuticals, Food & Beverages, Retail, etc.)

buyer_personas_page.details: 79 buyer personas load correctly with descriptions and keywords

events_alert.details: Alert shows buyer personas without future events with fictitious names ordered by contact count

theme_selection_dialog.details: Two modes available: 'Generar con IA' (default) and 'Escribir manualmente'

ai_title_generation.details: Emergent LLM generates titles based on thematic axis and buyer persona. Example: 'Inteligencia Artificial para Direcciones de RRHH'

buyer_personas_selector.details: Shows fictitious names with contact counts, has search filter and area filter dropdown
